title: Online Graduate School Learning Technology Application Course: Community-Based Experiential Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Course for in-service elementary teachers conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Operates with summative assessments, emphasizing applicability to real educational settings post-learning

learning_goals: Learners can practice and utilize three or more online collaboration tools applicable to science classes
Learners can design community-based experiential learning models and derive improvement plans through peer evaluation
Learners can submit portfolios demonstrating cases where digital learning skills acquired during the course were applied to actual science classes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
